creator: Teacher Tools Private Limited
descriptionHtml: Toddle enables students can add their classwork easily to their own digital portfolios, do self-evaluation on assessments and also track their goals & milestones.

title: Toddle Student

creator: Teacher Tools Private Limited
descriptionHtml:
Toddle Student App helps students document their learning journey through photos, videos, audio notes etc.

P.S. - You will only be able to sign in if your school has subscribed to one of Toddle’s premium plans.

Developed by experienced IB educators, Toddle is your school’s partner for all things PYP. Toddle streamlines planning, portfolios, reports, and family communication - all from one beautiful interface. Toddle is currently used by 18,000+ educators across 1000+ schools.

Through the Toddle Student App, students can:
Document their learning journey in the form of photos, videos, galleries, audio notes etc.
Access assessments sent by their classroom teachers and make their submissions
Have one-on-one conversations with their teachers
Participate in moderated class discussions
Set their own learning goals and track those by capturing photos, videos of their work

In case you face any difficulties in downloading or accessing the app, please reach out to support@toddleapp.com

descriptionHtml:
Note: You will only be able to sign in if your school has subscribed to Toddle’s premium plan.

Through the Toddle Student App, you can:
* Document your learning journey in the form of photos, videos, galleries, audio notes, etc.
* Access assessments made by your classroom teachers and make timely submissions
* Participate in moderated class discussions
* Set your own learning goals and track them by capturing evidence
* Have one-on-one conversations with teachers

Developed by experienced Educators, Toddle is your school’s partner for all things related to the curriculum. Toddle streamlines planning, portfolios, classroom, reports, and family communication— all on one beautiful interface. Toddle is currently being used by 30,000+ educators across 1000+ schools.
